Text:
Porfin que region es? PAL o NTCS? El titulo dise Region Free pero abajo en la descripcion dise video PAL. Cual es la region alguien sabes? Gracias...

Does any one know the correct region on this game? On the tital it says Reagion Free but on the description it says video PAL. Does any one know for sure what region this game is? Thanks...
